EmailTemplate.subject: A whole-person approach to controlling chronic conditions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For every step of the healthcare journey: Chronic condition management Our data-driven, personalized, whole-person approach helps people living with chronic conditions, including diabetes and hypertension, and is proven to establish good habits that lead to lasting behavior change—and that's good for health plan quality metrics too.
For example, one large health plan that partners withTeladoc Health for diabetes management measured a reduction of up to 83% in A1c screening gap rate among members who experienced a coaching interaction.1
Read our client success story to learn how this health plan significantly reduced gaps in care in one of its vulnerable populations while boosting Star Ratings.
